other_tests.findings: Preoperative PTH level decreased from 1541 to 590 pg/mL postoperatively, and hypercalcemia resolved.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Despite a high PTH level, he suffered an episode of postoperative hypocalcemia with a nadir of 6.9 mg/dL.

other_tests.findings: Subsequent resolution of hypercalcemia after administration.
other_tests.changes_over_time: His Ca levels remained in the reference range for 2â€“3 months after treatment, thereafter requiring denosumab as needed when Ca rose above the reference range.
